In the project settings, there's one for 'run' where you can choose between=

'run the right thing for the file that's open' and 'run the same damned
th=
ing every time regardless of what's open'.

Change that to the latter, then=
 manually run your junit one time.
Thereafter, run will just do the right t=
hing.

Ping me mike.hill AT anarchycreek.com if you need more details.

Hil=
l
http://anarchycreek.com

u to import some launch configuration as external

lp/suggestions.
